item.title: Deploy Ansible With Cobbler.
item.description: 1. Scenario. How about to use a light application for IaaS. As we all know, the platform like OpenStack is awesome but too heavy. For small business, we always do not create a complex architecture. Since Kubernetes(K8S) appears, we give more scope to it in IaaS. Now, I can use Cobbler and Ansible to manage some part of IaaS. They are much simpler than other platform such as OpenStack, Rancher, Vmware and so on, which can also be a good choice.
